title: Don Covay, Wrote 'Chain Of Fools,' Dies At 76
teaser: R&B singer-songwriter Don Covay died on Saturday at the age of 76. Covay's music was recorded by the likes of Aretha Franklin, Chubby Checker, Gladys Knight & the Pips and The Rolling Stones.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
